pages.title: Mana Grinder
pages.text: The Mana Grinder is a machine that allows the user to grind down blocks and items by consuming $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el. When using the Mana Grinder on ores, the result is usually better than in a furnace.

To use this block, you need to provide a constant supply of $(l:e_mana_machine_mana)Mana/el. This can be done by $(l:e_mechanic_mana_linking)linking/el a $(l:e_block_mana_relay)Mana Relay/el or a $(l:e_block_mana_generators)Mana Generator/el to it.
Keep in mind that this machine can not run on its own. You need to provide a $(l:e_mana_machine_sources)Mana source/el for it to work.
